notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified about new messages, job applications, and task updates even when the app is closed.
notifications.iosInstallHelp: On iPhone, push notifications only work when Kolab is installed on your home screen:
notifications.iosStep1: Tap the Share button (square with arrow) in Safari
notifications.iosStep2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
notifications.iosStep3: Open Kolab from your home screen
notifications.iosStep4: Come back here to enable notifications
notifications.iosVersionRequired: Push notifications require iOS 16.4 or later. Please update your iPhone.
notifications.notSupported: Push notifications are not supported by your browser. Try using Chrome, Firefox, or Safari 16.4+.
notifications.blockedHelp: To re-enable, go to your browser or phone settings and allow notifications for this site.
notifications.testSent: Test notification sent! Check your device.
